com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning.util

Class DataPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning.util.DataPoint
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultOptimizer.Point, RLAgent.Action, RLAgent.State

    public class DataPoint
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of key-value pairs for inputs and outputs. Used for optimizers and estimators.

    Author:
    Team 2412.
